scripts.build:main: pnpm run build:iframe && cross-env TARGET=src/index.tsx FORMATS=es,umd FILE_NAME=main OUT=./dist vite build
scripts.build:iframe: tsc && cross-env TARGET=src/iframe/iframe.ts FORMATS=es,umd FILE_NAME=iframe OUT=./iframe vite build
scripts.serve: cross-env TARGET=src/index.tsx FORMATS=es,umd FILE_NAME=main OUT=./dist vite serve
